code:
sequenceDiagram
    Client->>+LoadBalancer: HTTPS GET /
    LoadBalancer->>+NGINX: HTTP(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) GET /
    loop route
        NGINX ->> NGINX: Route based on Host/ServerAlias
    end
    NGINX->>+Webservice: HTTP GET /
    Webservice->>-NGINX: HTTP 302/200 (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    NGINX->>-LoadBalancer: HTTP 302/200 (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    LoadBalancer->>-Client: HTTP 302/200 (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
